output_list.description: The 'PayWinner' function allows an attacker to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
The 'distribute' function allows an attacker to set an arbitrary user's balance to any value.
The 'ToOwner' function allows an attacker to claim ownership and funds.
The 'mintToken' function allows an attacker to set an arbitrary user's balance to any value.
The 'PayWinner' function allows an attacker to select an arbitrary user as the winner, enabling exploitation.
The 'stopGame' function allows an attacker to stop the game, enabling unauthorized reinitialization.
The 'claimThrone' function allows an attacker to claim the prize, enabling DoS attacks.
